replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
什么版本。。

1.14.4 的话
先创建一个记分板
/scoreboard objectives add ban dummy {"text":"公告"}
再输 /scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar ban 

添加内容
/scoreboard players set 内容 ban 10

replies.txt_content:
